DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether patient receive regular physical therapy immediately follow modify neck dissection surgery report decrease shoulder disability , decrease pain , improve maintain shoulder range motion strength , improve quality life receive home instruction .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Early Physical Therapy Intervention Following Modified Unilateral Neck Dissection Treatment Head Neck Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adults age 1885 , able give inform consent Subject provide write informed consent Received Modified Unilateral Neck Dissection spar SAN Not currently use transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) pain relieve modality Not currently receive acupuncture pain relieve modality Able participate treatment group protocol include physical therapy appointment every week History prior shoulder injury surgery include rotator cuff repair total shoulder arthroplasty . History CVA hemi paresis Bilateral neck dissection Known sever SAN
DOC.keyword: Spinal Accessory Nerve Palsy , Cranial Nerve XI , shoulder weakness , neck stiffness , head neck cancer , neck dissection
